clinical_study.brief_title: The Psychological Effects of Different Sedation Protocol on Mechanically Ventilated Critically Ill Adults.
clinical_study.official_title: The Psychological Effects of Different Sedation Protocol on Mechanically Ventilated Critically Ill adults-a Prospective, Randomized and Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The study was designed to explore the effects of different sedation protocol on incidence rates of delirium and PTSD in severe patients with mechanically ventilation.
